text: Broken Flowers is a 2005 French American mystery comedy drama movie directed by Jim Jarmusch and starring Bill Murray, Sharon Stone, Alexis Dziena, Frances Conroy, Christopher McDonald, Jessica Lange, Tilda Swinton, Julie Delpy, Mark Webber, ChloÃ« Sevigny.
